doc:
Tommy Kirk https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tommy_Kirk 0 Thomas Lee Kirk (born December 10, 1941) is an American former actor and later a businessman. He is best known for his performances in a number of highly popular movies made by Walt Disney Studios such as Old Yeller, The Shaggy Dog, The Swiss Family Robinson and The Misadventures of Merlin Jones, as well as beach-party movies of the mid-1960s. Thomas_Lee_Kirk ( born December_10_,_1941 ) is an_American_former_actor and later a_businessman .
